import React from "react"; import './instructions.css'; import instruction_1 from './images/instruction_1.png' import Instruction_2 from './images/instruction_1.png' import Instruction_3 from './images/instruction_1.png' import instruction_4 from './images/instruction_1.png' import instruction_5 from './images/instruction_1.png' import instruction_6 from './images/instruction_1.png' function Instructions() { return (

Instructions

Learn how to use Professor Marvin

  1. Navigate to the upload page


  2. Drag, drop, and delete .pdf files as needed


  3. Provide at least 1 file and press 'Get Studying'


  4. Chat with Professor Marvin. Ask him questions or answer his questions


  5. Delete messages with the 'Clear Chat' Button


  6. Change files by clicking 'Edit Files'


); } export default Instructions;
